1.Title: Fragile Sweetness
1.Description: The equipper's Energy Regen increases by <color=#2BAD00>0.46</color>/s. All squad members gain <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> ATK and <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> Max HP. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad. When the equipper activates or extends an <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Veil</color>, all squad members gain <color=#2BAD00>30%</color> CRIT DMG for 60s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
